summary: This document is a Deutsche Bank alert regarding Jeffrey Epstein, highlighting his status as a registered sex offender and detailing various criminal convictions related to sex offenses and fraud. It includes information about his addresses and a history of legal issues, including multiple convictions for soliciting prostitution and related offenses. This document contains alerts from Deutsche Bank regarding Jeffrey Epstein, highlighting critical risk alerts associated with his financial activities. It references various media articles discussing Epstein's legal troubles, including allegations of sexual misconduct and connections to high-profile individuals, particularly Prince Andrew. This document contains alerts from Deutsche Bank regarding Jeffrey Epstein, highlighting various media articles related to his legal issues, settlements, and ongoing lawsuits. It includes references to Epstein's financial dealings and legal disputes, as well as mentions of his status as a sex offender.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as a registered sex offender with a history of soliciting prostitution and other criminal activities. The document details his various convictions and legal issues.

connections.description: Prince Andrew is noted to have a friendship with Jeffrey Epstein, which has drawn public scrutiny due to Epstein's criminal activities.

events.title: Conviction for Soliciting Prostitution
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was convicted of soliciting an underage girl for prostitution and began serving an 18-month sentence.

events.title: Served Jail Time
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein served 12 months for a state charge of prostitution solicitation and registered as a sex offender.

events.title: Investigation into Underage Girls
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was accused of keeping underage girls as 'sex slaves' for prominent men, with an ongoing investigation.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is a registered sex offender since 2008 after pleading guilty to soliciting prostitution.
He has been convicted multiple times for soliciting prostitution, including charges involving underage girls.
As of May 2013, Epstein had made 17 out-of-court settlements related to sexual assault claims.
The document alerts that Epstein appears on the New York Sex Offenders site.
There are multiple mentions of Epstein's criminal history, including convictions for fraud and theft.
Jeffrey Epstein is under monitoring by Deutsche Bank due to critical risk alerts associated with his financial activities.
Multiple media articles referenced in the document discuss Epstein's legal issues and connections to Prince Andrew.
The document highlights Epstein's ongoing legal troubles, including allegations of sexual misconduct and lawsuits against him.
Prince Andrew's relationship with Epstein is scrutinized in light of Epstein's criminal activities.
The document contains numerous references to media coverage of Epstein's case, indicating significant public interest.
